item.title: How to Apply HotSpot UV
item.description: Add TrimSheet asset Create a TrimSheet asset from selected texture in Content Browser. Add HotSpot Rects Double click the TrimSheet asset to open TrimSheet editor. Switch to edit mode and add a box Select vertex or edges to edit the box to desired shape Add more boxes and verify rects been generated automatically Apply HotSpot UV Select the TrimSheet asset in content browser, then select faces you want to apply hotspot uv.
